# AsyncStructuredStream

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/async_structured_agent/AsyncStructuredStream" symbolName="AsyncStructuredStream" /> AsyncStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

This class supports async iteration to process structured outputs as they arrive
from the model.


**Alias to:** `mirascope_v2_llm.responses.AsyncStructuredStream`
